mapper.sql: TID, TKEY, NAME, CONF_TYPE, CONF_START_TM, CONF_EXE_TIMES, CONF_INTERVAL_UNIT, CONF_INTERVAL, STATUS_PROCESSOR, STATUS_LAST_EXE_TM, STATUS_RUNED_TIME, PROCESSING, EXECUTING, SERVICE_NAME, VALID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ts_task
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ts_task (TID, TKEY, NAME, CONF_TYPE, CONF_START_TM, CONF_EXE_TIMES, CONF_INTERVAL_UNIT, CONF_INTERVAL, STATUS_PROCESSOR, STATUS_LAST_EXE_TM, STATUS_RUNED_TIME, PROCESSING, EXECUTING, SERVICE_NAME, VALID ) values (#{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{confStartTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confIntervalUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusProcessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusLastExeTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusRunedTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processing,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{executing,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ts_task
TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TKEY = #{record.tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_TYPE = #{record.confType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONF_START_TM = #{record.confStartTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONF_EXE_TIMES = #{record.confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},

STATUS_PROCESSOR = #{record.statusProcessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_LAST_EXE_TM = #{record.statusLastExeTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_RUNED_TIME = #{record.statusRunedTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROCESSING = #{record.processing,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXECUTING = #{record.executing,jdbcType=CHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID = #{record.valid,jdbcType=CHAR},

update ts_task set TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TKEY = #{record.tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_TYPE = #{record.confType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONF_START_TM = #{record.confStartTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONF_EXE_TIMES = #{record.confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONF_INTERVAL_UNIT = #{record.confIntervalUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_INTERVAL = #{record.confInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_PROCESSOR = #{record.statusProcessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_LAST_EXE_TM = #{record.statusLastExeTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_RUNED_TIME = #{record.statusRunedTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PROCESSING = #{record.processing,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXECUTING = #{record.executing,jdbcType=CHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID = #{record.valid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update ts_task
TKEY = #{tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_TYPE = #{confType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONF_START_TM = #{confStartTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONF_EXE_TIMES = #{confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONF_INTERVAL_UNIT = #{confIntervalUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_INTERVAL = #{confInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_PROCESSOR = #{statusProcessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_LAST_EXE_TM = #{statusLastExeTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_RUNED_TIME = #{statusRunedTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROCESSING = #{processing,jdbcType=CHAR},
EXECUTING = #{executing,jdbcType=CHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=CHAR},
where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
